title: Mysql
description: MCP server for providing read-only access to MySQL databases, enabling schema inspection and query execution.
creator: benborla

MYSQL_HOST.description: The hostname or IP address of the MySQL server.

MYSQL_PORT.description: The port number on which the MySQL server is running.

MYSQL_USER.description: The username for the MySQL database connection.

MYSQL_PASS.description: The password for the MySQL database connection.

MYSQL_DB.description: The name of the MySQL database to connect to.
